        public BufferedImage decompress(ByteBuffer buffer,
                                int width,
                                int height)
                         throws IOException,
                                IllegalArgumentException
        Description copied from interface: DXTDecompressor
        Decompress DXT1, DXT3 and DXT3A encoded rasters
        Specified by:
        decompress in interface DXTDecompressor
        width - must be a positive and power of two (4, 8, 16, 32, 64, 128, 512, etc )
        height - must be a positive and power of two (4, 8, 16, 32, 64, 128, 512, etc )
        Returns:
        java.awt.image.BufferedImage instance
        Throws:
        IOException - if there is a problem while reading from buffer or decompression
        IllegalArgumentException - if any input parameter is null or invalid
